note.p: The following procedure will remove from your system. It will not remove the Eclipse platform. If you wish to uninstall Eclipse please see its uninstall instructions.

step.cmd: Choose the menu option Help About Installation Details .
Select from the list of plugins.

If you want to remove also the user preferences that were configured in the Preferences dialog you must remove the folder %APPDATA%\com.oxygenxml
%APPDATA%\com.oxygenxml.author
%APPDATA%\com.oxygenxml.developer on Windows (usually %APPDATA% has the value [user-home-dir]\Application Data) / the subfolder .com.oxygenxml .com.oxygenxml.author .com.oxygenxml.developerof the user home directory on Linux / the subfolder Library/Preferences/com.oxygenxml Library/Preferences/com.oxygenxml.author Library/Preferences/com.oxygenxml.developer of the user home folder on Mac OS X.
